# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_guis/gh_magic_aspect_scripted_gui.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

magic_gui_increase_aspect_overcharge_scripted_gui = {
	scope = story
	
	is_shown = {
		exists = scope:spell_organizer
		is_target_in_variable_list = {
			name = spell_aspect_list
			target = scope:aspect_being_overcharged
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_organizer.var:casting_through_court_magi_var
				exists = scope:spell_organizer.cp:councillor_court_magi
			}
			scope:spell_organizer.cp:councillor_court_magi = { save_temporary_scope_as = caster }
		}
		trigger_else = {
			scope:spell_organizer = { save_temporary_scope_as = caster }
		}
		OR = {
			exists = scope:spell_organizer.var:uncapped_overcharge_var
			AND = {
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:fire }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:fire_max }
						fire_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:fire_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.fire_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.fire_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:water }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:water_max }
						water_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:water_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.water_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.water_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:ice }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:ice_max }
						ice_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:ice_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.ice_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.ice_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:air }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:air_max }
						air_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:air_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.air_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.air_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:stone }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:stone_max }
						stone_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:stone_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.stone_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.stone_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:dream }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:dream_max }
						dream_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:dream_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.dream_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.dream_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:celestial }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:celestial_max }
						celestial_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:celestial_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.celestial_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.celestial_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:dark }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:dark_max }
						dark_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:dark_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.dark_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.dark_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:light }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:light_max }
						light_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:light_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.light_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.light_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:blood }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:blood_max }
						blood_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:blood_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.blood_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.blood_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:nature }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:nature_max }
						nature_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:nature_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.nature_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.nature_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:ethereal }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:ethereal_max }
						ethereal_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:ethereal_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.ethereal_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.ethereal_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:hymns }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:hymns_max }
						hymns_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:hymns_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.hymns_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.hymns_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:death }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:death_max }
						death_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:death_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.death_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.death_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:sand }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:sand_max }
						sand_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:sand_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.sand_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.sand_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:metal }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:metal_max }
						metal_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:metal_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.metal_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.metal_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:time }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:time_max }
						time_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:time_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.time_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.time_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { scope:aspect_being_overcharged = flag:dawn }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = { exists = var:dawn_max }
						dawn_aspect_total_spell_level_value < var:dawn_max
					}
					scope:spell_organizer.dawn_total_overcharge_value < scope:caster.dawn_aspect_max_overcharge_bonus_value
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { spell_has_tag_trigger = { NAME = flag:cantrip } }
	}
	
	effect = {
		magic_aspect_effect = { MODE = increase_overcharge }
	}
}

magic_gui_decrease_aspect_overcharge_scripted_gui = {
	scope = story
	
	is_shown = {
		
	}
	
	effect = {
		magic_aspect_effect = { MODE = decrease_overcharge }
	}
}
character_creation_increase_fire_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = var:fire } }
			set_variable = {
				name = fire
				value = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_variable = {
				name = fire
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

character_creation_decrease_fire_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { exists = var:fire }
			change_variable = {
				name = fire
				subtract = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { var:fire <= 0 }
				remove_variable = fire
			}
		}
	}
}

character_window_show_fire_skill_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
		OR = {
			fire_aspect_spellcasting_value >= 8
			knows_magic_school_with_fire_aspect_trigger = yes
		}
	}
	
	effect = {
		
	}
}

		OR = {
			death_aspect_spellcasting_value >= 8
			knows_magic_school_with_death_aspect_trigger = yes
		}
	}
	
	effect = {
		
	}
}
character_creation_increase_sand_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = var:sand } }
			set_variable = {
				name = sand
				value = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_variable = {
				name = sand
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

character_creation_decrease_sand_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { exists = var:sand }
			change_variable = {
				name = sand
				subtract = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { var:sand <= 0 }
				remove_variable = sand
			}
		}
	}
}

character_window_show_sand_skill_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
		OR = {
			sand_aspect_spellcasting_value >= 8
			knows_magic_school_with_sand_aspect_trigger = yes
		}
	}
	
	effect = {
		
	}
}
character_creation_increase_metal_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = var:metal } }
			set_variable = {
				name = metal
				value = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_variable = {
				name = metal
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

character_creation_decrease_metal_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { exists = var:metal }
			change_variable = {
				name = metal
				subtract = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { var:metal <= 0 }
				remove_variable = metal
			}
		}
	}
}

	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
		OR = {
			metal_aspect_spellcasting_value >= 8
			knows_magic_school_with_metal_aspect_trigger = yes
		}
	}
	
	effect = {
		
	}
}

	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = var:time } }
			set_variable = {
				name = time
				value = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_variable = {
				name = time
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { exists = var:time }
			change_variable = {
				name = time
				subtract = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { var:time <= 0 }
				remove_variable = time
			}
		}
	}
}

	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
		OR = {
			time_aspect_spellcasting_value >= 8
			knows_magic_school_with_time_aspect_trigger = yes
		}
	}

character_creation_increase_dawn_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = var:dawn } }
			set_variable = {
				name = dawn
				value = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_variable = {
				name = dawn
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

character_creation_decrease_dawn_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
	
	}
	
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { exists = var:dawn }
			change_variable = {
				name = dawn
				subtract = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { var:dawn <= 0 }
				remove_variable = dawn
			}
		}
	}
}

	scope = character
	
	is_shown = {
		OR = {
			dawn_aspect_spellcasting_value >= 8
			knows_magic_school_with_dawn_aspect_trigger = yes
		}
	}
	
	effect = {
		
	}
